Reviews.Title: “Something a bit different”
Reviews.Author: Alex B
Reviews.Content: beautifully decorated kept bit special comfortable bed quiet considering excellent location ideal quiet relaxing romantic retreat walking aroung nyc day complimentery prosecco arrival becasue honeymoon didnt loved variety teas available attitude staff left bit desired excellent

Reviews.Title: “Needs Maintenance Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: randyrosenthal
Reviews.Content: planned five night stay left squint townhouse amazing eyes wide sad poor mold mini bar fridge furniture falling apart beyond shabby chic plain shabby territory stale musty smell covered candles burning halls rusted shower caddy paint peeling walls doors bathroom pipes left grime caked onto light switches potential imagine fabulous prices inn irving spend keeping

Reviews.Title: “like being in a James Ivory´s movie”
Reviews.Author: elisbzk
Reviews.Content: irving quiet street manhattan near park union square abc carpet home village name door 56 door magic helpful correct staff amazing interior design adorable fireplace breakfast lady excelent expect encounter edith corridors worth afford

Reviews.Title: “Quiet and serene”
Reviews.Author: moogalah
Reviews.Content: hotel lovely helpful pleasant decor victorian pretty bed hard rock sheets nice quiet street normal nyc hotels liked alot dont stay cause uncomfortable bed lovely job

Reviews.Title: “A real gem -fabulous, quirky hotel in a great neighbourhood”
Reviews.Author: Sue_BirdLondon
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel reminiscent nice english bb fantastic furniture decorations lovely attentive staff wonderful breakfast hotel people enjoying tea holding private parties enjoying atmosphere draw noise due private parties excessive romantic spot getaway
